projects.title: What are you putting on your face?
projects.desc: I have utilized my skills in finding out what I have been putting on my face for a few years and what kind of chemicals I have been exposed to. The project's goal is to explore the ingredients used in those products and to make a recommendation model based on the ingredients involved.

projects.title: EDA on Top Engineering Colleges India
projects.desc: Project on analysis of top 300 engineering colleges of India by web scraping data and then making exploratory analysis.

projects.title: K-drama Analysis
projects.desc: Analysis on various Korean dramas and recommendations based on a number of factors like particular Actor, Director , Writer then recommendations based on Genre , Year , Number of Episodes etc, using python & ML Libraries
